NHAIICOMMERCIAL OPERATIONSI: 61 Sub: Concessions in user fee to local residents: Public Funded Projects Reference is made to Circular no. NHAIICommercial Operations/56 dated 29.3.2005 (copy enclosed ) providing consolidated instructions on the matter of concession in user fee to local residents_ Considering various representations on the matter, it has been decided that in respect of CarlJeepIVan, the requirement of Registration Certificate (RC) reflecting the same address as mentioned in Annexure A, is dispensed with: This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
